headline: Should You be Confident in Becton, Dickinson and Company’s (BDX) Ability to Deliver Long-Term Returns?
summary: Generation Investment Management, an investment management firm, released its “Global Equity Strategy” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The firm is not a momentum investor and avoids companies with uncertain future earnings and high valuations. The firm invests for the long-term and remains curious about new companies. […]
